[
  "(:action find
  ; Find an appropriate resource and update its selection status
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?resource - object ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (not (selected ?resource)) (condition_met ?resource))
  :effect (selected ?resource)
)",

  "(:action collect ; Collect an item and update its status in the player's inventory
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?loc - location ?item - collectible)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?loc) (collectible ?item) (not (in_inventory ?agent ?item)))
  :effect (and (in_inventory ?agent ?item) (collected ?item)))",

  "(:action create ; Create an entity by transforming available resources
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?loc - location ?resource - object ?product - entity)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?loc) (inventory ?agent ?resource))
  :effect (and (created ?product ?resource) (not (inventory ?agent ?resource))))",

  "(:action use ; Use a resource to modify an entity's state
  :parameters (?user - agent ?resource - object ?target - entity ?location - location)
  :precondition (and (at ?user ?location) (not (used ?user ?resource ?target)) (has_resource ?user ?resource))
  :effect (and (used ?user ?resource ?target) (not (has_resource ?user ?resource))))"
]
